author: not
msg: ARIES-597 Attempt to manually merge the patch

author: not
msg: ARIES-612 A test that makes sure you can call a reference in a destroy method. It will blow up if something goes wrong.

author: not
msg: ARIES-612 The blueprint container currently removes services, stops tracking references, and then destroys beans in reverse creation order (which I assume is the same as reverse dependency order). The problem is beans can depend on references and if they try to use references in destroy bad things happen. This commit moves the shutdown of references to after the beans are destroyed which should solve the problem.

author: rhuijben
msg: (scan_eol): Following up on r1082851, scan for eol even when we can't fill
